data.name: That Stupid Game
data.detailed_description:
Join our discord!


About the Game



Team and Individual Online PvP (up to 8 players)

GAME MODES

  • Capture The Flag
  • Last Man Standing
  • Last Team Standing

MECHANICS

  • 3rd person view (lay bombs)
  • 1st person view (fire rockets)
  • Bombs explode and chain to the rhythm of the music
  • Throw & kick bombs
  • Bigger explosions
  • Kamikaze
  • Jetpack
  • Invisibility
  • Speedups
  • Debuff your opponents with strategically placed noxious gas
  • Stack powerups like 1st person + jetpack + invisibility for ultimate predator

LEVEL EDITOR



Create your own levels and play them with friends / enemies over the interwebzen.

THE STORY SO FAR...

You are the chosen one, along with 8 billion other ones who have also been chosen - handpicked if you will. Are you up to the task of saving the planet? Or not saving the planet and leaving a trail of mayhem and destruction in your path (more fun)?


There will be blood! (or not if you turn it off in settings)

A FINAL NOTE


"Don't shoot the seagull. He's nice." - Chadwick, The Seagull

data.short_description: A not-so-serious online multiplayer game with 1st and 3rd person mechanics set in the classic Bomberman style. Bombs, rocket launchers, jetpacks, CTF, crazy rhythmic elements and much more. Includes 3 competitive games modes and a level editor for infinite replayability.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Onboard graphics should be okay
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a preliminary list of requirements that will be updated closer to the game's release

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Processor: Anything from the last few years should be okay
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This is a preliminary list of requirements that will be updated closer to the game's release
